refnamediv.refpurpose: What we aim to provide in the long term

refsect1.para: Here is a non-exhaustive list of what we expect to provide to app developers:

listitem.para: File chooser and Recent chooser APIs
Brand new widgets for more complex types of accesses
Userland graphic stack capabilities with Wayland
Other funky things such as printers, sharing data with other apps, etc
And tools to plug Sandbox Utils into a sandboxing mechanism and have your system use it to run apps!
